name: Heart of Atlantis
summary: Since you were young, you’ve always felt as if something was calling you to the sea. Now, as an oceanography student, you come across the discovery of a lifetime with your dark and broodingly handsome professor—the sunken city of Atlantis. But your field study takes an unexpected turn when your submarine crashes and you wake in the arms of a beautiful merman, who’s the crown prince of the lost kingdom.
